Actually, the video quality is pure crap and reminds me of what television and VHS gave me 10 years ago. The subtitles are adequate. Sometimes there are glitches ie lurking/looking. The value this torrent possesses is that it is SMALL. The .mkv compression is stupid for video and audio of this low quality. If ya just want to WATCH the series, this torrent is fine.If you want to EXPERIENCE Weeds, then this torrent blows chunks.
The 720p claim may be real, but the QUALITY is 480.

There is no such thing as "mkv compression". Matroska (.mkv/.mka) is a container, not a codec.
To put it an another way: You are using a matroska container to store an audio stream and a video stream. Those streams are the result of encoding.
(mp3 for audio and xvid for the video part for example)
